Description: 2017 Gibson SG Special T Satin w/Duncan Pickups, TonePros locking metal, Hipshot Locking Tuners. The Gibson SG Special T 2017 has a stylish satin finish and a very played-in feel. The edges of the frets are rolled off, so the fingerboard feels extremely comfortable. Smooth playing is guaranteed. Features The sound comes from two humbuckers with a medium to highoutput. There’s a Seymour Duncan Jazz in the neck position and an AWESOME Seymour Duncan Custom 5 pickup at the bridge. All the classic SG tones are present, but withadditional girth, tonality and chime over the original pickups. You can use the Volume and Tone controls that belong to eachhumbucker to shape your sound further. A toggle switch on the body allows youto choose the neck pickup, the bridge pickup or both humbuckers at the sametime. The Gibson SG Special T 2017 has a mahogany body, a mahogany neck and a rosewood fingerboard. The Slim Taper neck profile feels verycomfortable to your hand and the 24,75″ scale length feels instantly familiar. The dull sounding original hardware was replaced by TonePros Locking Hardware: 1) TP Tune-a-maticlocking bridge 2) TP Locking tailpiece 3) TP Lockingtailpiece studs Top Features Hipshot Locking Vintage-style keystone-look tuners: Traditional looks with precise locking performance … a HUGE upgrade Tektoid nut: Dense and self-lubricating for great sustain and accurate return to pitch Thicker rosewood fingerboard: Richer tone, with a great playing feel under the fingers Slim-taper neck profile: A popular profile that's fast and comfortable Small-block pearloid inlays: Custom looks for an additional touch of vintage class Mahogany body: Select traditional tonewoods Seymour Duncan Jazz & Custom 5 humbuckers: Versatile humbuckers made with Alnico magnets Classic Gibson controls: 2 volumes, 2 tones, 1 toggle switch for total control TonePros Locking Tune-O-Maticbridge and Stop Bar Tailpiece: Upgrade over original hardware for rock-solid sustain and precise intonation, nickel-plated for vintage looks Gibson Padded gigbag: Protective and easy to carry Condition: Used. Overall excellent, with a couple minor dings. No neck cracks or repairs of any kind. Upgraded Hipshot locking tuners, locking TonePros metal hardware, upgraded pickups. A note about open-grain satin guitars. Go to Guitar Center, play a satin, open-grain SG and compare with a Poly or even a thickerNitro finish traditional. The difference in sound is amazing! Acoustically, the satin SG is more lively, louder and more dynamic ... more musical. You can also hear the difference through an amp! Shipping: Continental USA only. Local pickup Detroit area. Packaging is same as Gibson or Fender. Never had shipping damage, knock on wood.
